Package io.github.zero88.jooqx.adapter

Interface RecordFactory<REC extends org.jooq.Record,​R>

  • Type Parameters:
    REC - The type of jOOQ record
    R - The type of expected result
    All Superinterfaces:
    org.jooq.RecordMapper<REC,​R>
    public interface RecordFactory<REC extends org.jooq.Record,​R>
extends org.jooq.RecordMapper<REC,​R>
    Record factory defines the necessary methods to transform Vert.x SQL row to jOOQ record then map record into a custom type.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    See Also:
    RecordMapper
    API Note:
    Record factory is only related to jOOQ functionality
